page.title: 09CRAIGCROOK CASTLE,EDINBURGH.
page.content: There it stood looking very evil indeed,staring nastily,at all around with a grimace on its ugly black face.It seemed to be turning towards you in the twilight,its old wrinkled stone face definitely seemed to be meaning no good at all.In fact, he looked absolutely terrifying.A tall, cloaked statue patrolled the grounds assisted by a doberman pincher.As I was staring motionless through the foggy,misty air I thought I saw a couple of white faces lurking behind the statue, as if the three were having a conversation.I ran.....fast. The castle today is really quite a pleasant building.Although it was originally built as a{'keep' in 1545 to be used for{defence of Edinburgh}in time of{siege}it has now been modernised and turned into offices.
